c301.AdventureBook

Class AnnotationActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • c301.AdventureBook.AnnotationActivity

  • public class AnnotationActivity
extends Activity
    This is the annotation activity. It is run when a user wants to annotate a story fragment.
    Author:
    Terence
